description: This file is a Streamlit web application script that provides a user interface for the Universal Agent Interface (UAgI). It manages session state, user inputs, agent configuration, and displays chat messages and tool calls, orchestrating interactions with backend components such as UAgIConfig, Team, and various utility functions.

classes.name: UAgIConfig
classes.description: Configuration class for setting up the Universal Agent Interface with user ID, model, tools, and agents.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents involved in the UAgI process.

methods.name: header
methods.description: Renders the header section of the Streamlit app with title and subtitle.

methods.name: body
methods.description: Main function that manages the user interaction flow, including session management, message handling, and agent response streaming.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point that initializes the session state and runs the header, body, and about sections asynchronously.
